meanings.definition: A Greek baked pasta dish with ground meat and béchamel sauce.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious pastitsios for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional pastitsios with a side salad.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to juggle three hot pastitsios at once, but they all fell on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The layers of flavors in the pastitsios danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked pastitsios filled the kitchen.
